incident_updates.body: Start time : 08/08/2022 05:11 UTC Service impact : 9 servers are unreachable on rack 41A02 Ongoing actions : An intervention is in progress. Root cause : The remote reboot system was defective for a moment.
Ongoing actions : The vRack service is available again in the whole row S321B and especially for the racks S321B01/S321B04/S321B05. We are keeping the situation under surveillance.

Ongoing actions : The vRack service is available for the integrality of the racks in room S321B except rack S321B01/S321B04/S321B05. We apologize for the inconvenience due. Our technical teams continue to work to restore your services.
Ongoing actions : In the meantime, the vRack service may be unavailable on some servers. Our teams are still working on the problem.
Ongoing actions : Power is being restored to the servers. Meanwhile, our teams are working to resolve the incident. We will get back to you when the incident is resolved.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have identified the problem of the incident which is an electrical problem. We are continuing our investigations.
Start time : 07/08/2022 12:33 UTC Service impact : Some servers are unreachable in row S321B Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.
